name: FOX TWO: Air Combat
description:
FOX TWO: Air Combat is an exhilarating solitaire card game that puts you in the cockpit of the most iconic fighter jets of the 1980s and '90s. With just 18 cards, you'll experience the thrill of aerial dogfights in the golden age of air combat.

Take command of your favorite aircraft and prove your skills in intense, simulated battles to become the king of the skies. Execute either offensive or defensive maneuvers each turn, carefully managing your energy to outmaneuver the enemy fighter. Lock on, launch missiles, and dominate the skies!

Featuring multi-use cards, hand management, and deterministic combat, FOX TWO: Air Combat delivers a very compact yet immersive experience of resource management and strategic decision-making. Are you ready to claim air superiority?

—description from the designer
